great graphics  maps are pretty good  offline bot play option my favorite feature for this game yes i hate pvp  gameplay is very satisfying  almost everything has progression stats also works for offline bot play   always online requirement you cant play the game offline even with bots when server shuts down game will become permanently unplayable  no campaign mode  frequent crashes with directx getdeviceremoved error which is game breaking

the game started out absolutely horrible at launch and i will be honest and say it has come a long way from that buggy mess however if youre looking for the true battlefield experience like bf4 then wait for battlefield 6 this game isnt all that bad but there are some glaring flaws in the design that really cant be fixed given the context of the game its best to pass on this and get bf6 if you want new games or go get bf4 the community there is very much still alive and kicking

to the studios that stayed with the game despite its troubled launch and provided seasons of worth of live service content balancebug fixes and the most cool and interesting vision of the near future regarding art and aesthetics thank you from the bottom of my heart  you made a breathtaking sandboxy and fun battlefield experience  just never ever try to do named characters again please i love their abilities but they dont need a personality attached to them
black ops 6 and battlefield 5 are better than this thing  you can still have fun sometimes but most of the time youre just gonna be dissapointed
